overview: In this high-stakes drama, an ambitious outsider and his friends navigate the chaotic, larger-than-life, yet uncertain world of Bollywood.

1.episodeOverview: Aasmaan's debut film scores big, earning him a contract at a star-studded bash. At an actors' roundtable, he throws shade at nepo-baby Karishma Talvar.
Aasmaan meets Freddy and later signs a commercial to fund his father's surgery. Ajay disapproves of the male lead cast opposite his daughter.
Parvaiz fanboys over Aasmaan and Karishma's new intimacy coach. A video of the leads goes viral for the wrong reasons. Freddy seeks Ajay's help.
Avtar's hit song catches Karan Johar's attention. Ajay objects to the film's intimate scenes. Karishma's birthday party brings a huge surprise.
Jaraj shows Freddy an incriminating video of Aasmaan and pitches a plan. After falling out with Parvaiz, Aasmaan receives upsetting news.
Avtar turns away an unexpected guest. At a glamorous awards show, Aasmaan faces a pleasant surprise — but soon finds himself in trouble.
As Aasmaan and Karishma try to elope with Parvaiz's help, Ajay chases after them. A shocking revelation threatens to upend Aasmaan's world.
